title: malcovi2
author: malcovi2
content: Do not update the app or save your keys and any important access to your accounts and uninstall.https://cointelegraph.com/news/ftx-funds-on-the-move-bankruptcy-proceedings-insider-threat-or-a-hackhttps://twitter.com/naomibrockwell/status/1591301483055546369

comments.author: jossiel
comments.body: I also saw that news and the FTX telegram admin admitted that the hack has really happened.https://twitter.com/WatcherGuru/status/1591301679202590720Such a lot of things happening to FTX and it's already on its pitfall, I doubt it that it's going to end up with a good ending. It's just making each of its customer to be disappointed with its closure.

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: It is ridiculous, how for a site/app that millions visited several days ago to the site/app that publishes viruses and asks for admin access to steal the private key. Why did they not shutdown the site as long as things have become bad like this?In general, we must deal with these services with caution, and since things are blurry, it is better to believe all rumors in order to show the opposite.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on November 12, 2022, 09:33:51 AMIt is ridiculous, how for a site/app that millions visited several days ago to the site/app that publishes viruses and asks for admin access to steal the private key. Why did they not shutdown the site as long as things have become bad like this?In general, we must deal with these services with caution, and since things are blurry, it is better to believe all rumors in order to show the opposite.They have a weak IQ unfortunately Or maybe this is a drama they did to steal money from investors and traders and escape legal provisions on the pretext that someone hacked the exchange platform, so the most important question here is why did this hacking happen only after the FTX platform was bankrupt? The bankruptcy of the platform and its team is conclusive proof that they are the ones who fabricated this hacking rumor to exonerate themselves. There are hidden matters that we do not know yet. I hope that the government will investigate this incident because I am sad for the money of the users of the FTX platform, I hope that they will be compensated.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Quote from: hugeblack on November 12, 2022, 09:33:51 AMIt is ridiculous, how for a site/app that millions visited several days ago to the site/app that publishes viruses and asks for admin access to steal the private key. Why did they not shutdown the site as long as things have become bad like this?In general, we must deal with these services with caution, and since things are blurry, it is better to believe all rumors in order to show the opposite.Totally ridiculous and outrageous.I doubt it that the hackers will just play on their side and will inject some malware just for a visit. It's because they're trying to push people away on them as they tackle and deal with their existing problems. It will no longer surprise many if the websites Alameda is involved with will have come to its final day and will just shut down. And that is because it seems they can no longer deal with their matter.
